name: CoCoBan
description:
RedBeard and Mad Lab Productions proudly present:  CoCoBan!

CoCoBan is a self-discovery action puzzle game derived from Sokoban and Picoban with a few added twists.   Use the keyboard to push or pickup objects to make it to the green emerald goal.  Game progress is automatically saved to disk when you advance a level.  Be sure to turn up the volume to hear the sound effects!

CoCoBan requires a Tandy Color Computer 3 (or emulator) base system with a disk drive, and joystick/ mouse (for level editor only).

After downloading from the link below insert the disk into whichever drive you'd like and type LOADM"COCOBAN" to get started!

The "ULEVELS.BIN" file can be extracted or copied so you can share levels you create with your friends.  If you don't know how to extract or copy files from a virtual disk you can just send your friend the entire disk!

Enjoy hours of fun and likely some frustration with CoCoBan!  Be on the lookout for added levels in the future!
